title: How to know my skills or my interests - Quora

response.answer_text: Get out of your comfort zone . -Go and meet people from different walks of life and different professions . Maintain a interest and skill journalApprentice with people whose skills you see and than ask them for guidance on how you can improve it as well.Every job and project that you do , request the people there to grade you on skills that you use for the.In a timely Manner , track your interest and skill journal and keep viewing and reviewing themNow grade yourself as-beginner , Intermediate or expert , super expert on your skills and interests areas .go live your life

Hey..its a bit tough..but not impossible..look for knowing ur skills u need time..take it. Slowly and steadily..test every skill..u might be good at ..somw not..some u might be excellent at..some u might not. Choose things which spectaculate u..interest u..which u find catchy and a passion in. To know ur skills..u need to have passion..jnterest and a desire to do it. So try things which u think u cant try and choose. Good luck
